title: Shiritsu Shirobara Gakuen no Himitsu
original_name: 私立白薔薇学園の秘密
sinopse:
Girls are forbidden to fall in love in that school?

Rules are strict because only wealthy girls can enter in that school. There, she doesn't know why but she started to have her heart beating for a girl named Shinonome Ryou... Why is the secret that this school keep...?

Source: Chibi Manga
